TopicTitle: So everything is gone,how do i start over

Articles.Content: How do i install mods now,IF they'll even work with .20 ... Seems how i lost 280+hours and ALL OF MY FLIGHTS.and everything is changed with mods.Do i download, and install them just like before?or is there a new way to download them.
I too would like to know how to handle mods now... Do I just leave them in the folder they came in?

the only mod I know that has problems in .20 so far is KAS, but that has a fix in the forums already.

why did you lose all your flights?

I've been posting this all over the place but only because it is a very helpful response from Harv

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30613-New-part-loading-system

I too would like to know how to handle mods now... Do I just leave them in the folder they came in?

Yes.
